pre_caption: This video is a scenery shot that displays the interior of a digitally rendered room. The space features wood-paneled walls, empty white shelving units, and a simple bedroom setup with a single bed and a desk. A window in the room looks out onto a green, tree-lined landscape.
pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.

initial_feedback: 1. 这里最好加上通过外面的绿树风景向frame左侧移动可以推断出这是一个车厢内部的房间，列车正在朝着frame右侧行驶
gpt_feedback: 1. It would be beneficial to include a scene where the view of the green, tree-lined landscape moves to the left of the frame. This would suggest that the room is inside a train carriage, which is traveling to the right of the frame.
